{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3544177,"name":"Ahmet Selim","username":"wbishoop","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/w/d9b06d/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-03-01T14:02:31.202Z","cooked":"

Hi,

We nearly finished our robot, with a height of ~110 cm. But the inspection checklist specifies its limit to 106.68 cm. We are now trying to find a solution but it seems like this will be a big headache. Do you think there will be enough tolerance for 4 centimeters (~1.5 inches)?

Thank you

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":3,"updated_at":"2025-03-01T14:02:47.241Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":4,"reads":307,"readers_count":306,"score":81.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":493734,"topic_slug":"robot-height-limit-is-4cm-smaller-than-our-robot","display_username":"Ahmet Selim","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":67838,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/robot-height-limit-is-4cm-smaller-than-our-robot/493734/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3544182,"name":"Joseph Walters","username":"Jwal","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/jwal/{size}/228161_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-01T14:06:36.296Z","cooked":"

Unfortunately no, there is no tolerance.

R104 is clear that 3ft6in is the start config limit. Being taller than that will prevent you from passing inspection.

","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":3,"updated_at":"2025-03-01T14:07:33.194Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":307,"readers_count":306,"score":136.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":493734,"topic_slug":"robot-height-limit-is-4cm-smaller-than-our-robot","display_username":"Joseph Walters","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://frctools.com/2025/rule/R104","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"Rule R104 | FRCTools","clicks":1}],"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":5}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":63541,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/robot-height-limit-is-4cm-smaller-than-our-robot/493734/2","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":3},{"id":"+1","type":"emoji","count":1},{"id":"point_up","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":5,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3544183,"name":"Skye Leake","username":"Skyehawk","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/skyehawk/{size}/179363_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-01T14:06:43.789Z","cooked":"

Tolerance? No.

Things you may be able to do to get the overall height down? Yes.

Pictures help a ton.
